selftext:
Hey there! Are you in grades 9-12 in India? We're curious about how you use textbooks and other study materials. Your insights will help us understand how students learn, both in and out of the classroom. The survey takes just 10-15 minutes, and your input will make a real difference. Click the [link](https://tally.so/r/mK50EM) to start, and thanks for sharing your experience!

[https://tally.so/r/mK50EM](https://tally.so/r/mK50EM)
